author: senh
title: Overnighter: A French Castle, Now Open to All
text: BING NEWS: Willing to drive? July 4 camping options are still out there Drive a little in the Bay Area and you can have a great staycation — or an overnighter in the Santa Cruz Mountains — on the July Fourth weekend. Drive a lot and you still can salvage the biggest vacation weekend of the year.
